ADDRESS_CONTRACTING_BODY.OFFICIALNAME: Ministry of Defence, DSG, Defence Support Group (DSG)

TITLE.P: IRM 16/1308 Repair of Operational Infrastructure Equipment

SHORT_DESCR.P: This requirement will be split into lots. Suppliers who progress to the Invitation to Tender Stage can bid for one lot, several lots or a combination of lots.
A framework agreement covering all lots or framework agreements for individual or combination of lots will be awarded.
The requirement is being advertised in 5 separate lots:
— Lot 1: Repair and F Gas Testing of ECUs and HVAC Heater Mk II Equipment.
— Lot 2: Repair of Tactical Base Ablution Units & Pre-Deployment checks.
— Lot 3: Repair of Containerised Refrigeration Equipment.
— Lot 4: Repair of Pump Pressurisation Units.
— Lot 5: Supply of Containerised Equipment Spares.
We reserve the right to exclude any company that scores a 'no answer' or 'poor' answer to any question with the DPQQ.

TITLE.P: Repair and F-Gas Testing of 15Kw Environmental Control Units and HVAC Heater Mk II Equipment

SHORT_DESCR.P: 1) Repair and refurbishment of full current build standard.
— the scope of the repairs to be carried out shall be determined from the survey against OEM specification.
2) Statutory Annual Inspections and periodic checks to enable continued use of equipment.
3) Pre and Post Deployment Checks via "man-in-van" service.

No business whatsoever is guaranteed under any resulting framework or contract, indeed, there is no guaranteed that any framework agreement or contract will be put in place in relation to this notice.
No compensation etc. will be paid if a tender or resulting framework agreement is withdrawn for any reason.
Bidders should take part in this process only on the basis that they fully understand and accept this position.

OPTIONS_DESCR.P: 2 x option years to be exercised over 2 x 1-year increments if requirements.
Provisional timetable for recourse to these options: 24 months.

INFO_ADD.P: — this opportunity is available on www.contracts.mod.uk.go to the Response Manager and add the following Access Code: 8EU7296ED6.
— please ensure you follow any instruction provided to you.
— the deadline for submitting your responses is 09/09/2017 17:00. Allow plenty of time when responding prior to the closing date and time, especially if you have been asked to upload documents.

SHORT_DESCR.P: 1) Repair and refurbishment of full current build standard.

2) Statutory Annual Inspections and periodic checks to enable continued use of equipment.

SHORT_DESCR.P: An internally fitted, electrically powered, ac converted 20ft ISO unit maintains the temperature according to the control settings selected. Internal temperature is displayed on an external panel and an HI/LO temperature alarm system activates audio & visual alarm units if the internal temp varies from operator adjusted limits.
The unit is also equipped with level indicators, escape hatch, internal lighting, a trapped person alarm, earthing spike, circuit protection devices and a fire extinguisher.
The scope of the repairs to be determined from the survey against OEM specification. Statutory Annual Inspections & periodic checks to enable continued use of equipment.
Pre and Post Deployment Checks via "man-in-van" service.

No business whatsoever is guaranteed under any resulting framework or contract, indeed, there is no guarantee that any framework agreement or contract will be put in place in relation to this notice. No compensation etc. will be paid if a tender or result in.

OPTIONS_DESCR.P: 2 x option years to be exercised over 2 x 1-year increments if required.
Provisional timetable for recourse to these options: 24 months.

— please ensure you follow any instruction provided to you.
— the deadline for submitting your responses is 24/08/2017 17:00. Allow plenty of time when responding prior to the closing date and time, especially if you have been asked to upload documents.

SHORT_DESCR.P: The role of the Pump Pressurisation Units (PPU) is to provide clean pressure water circulation around the kitchen, laundry & ablution facilities of military camps. consists of a converted ISO container housing 2 electrically driven pumps, an accumulator vessel, inlet & outlet pipe-work &associated valves and electrical control systems.
The PPU is to be in constant use and is fitted with float valves to prevent the pumps running dry in the event that the water supply should be inadvertently cut off.
The scope of the repairs to be carried out shall be determined from the survey against OEM specification.
Statutory Annual Inspections & periodic checks to enable continued use of equipment.
Pre and Post Deployment Checks via "man-in-van" service.

No business whatsoever is guaranteed under any resulting framework or contract & there is no guarantee that any framework agreement or contract will be put in place in relation to this notice. No compensation etc. will be paid if.

OPTIONS_DESCR.P: 2 x option Years to be exercised in 2 x 1-year increments if required.
Provisional timetable for recourse to these options: 24 months.

The authority considers this contract may be suitable for economic operators that are small or medium enterprises (SMEs). However, any selection of tenderers will be based solely on the criteria set out for the procurement.
